title: Some Men's Dreams
description: He made her palms sweat, her heart trip. But Genevieve Kendall's dream had been bought at too high a price to sacrifice for fleeting passion in a gorgeous doctor's embrace. Jack O'Neill was her boss - her mentor - and she had something to tell him about his only child that just might break his heart.... Could he believe her? Did he have a choice? If saving his daughter meant facing his past, then Jack O'Neill would do it. With Gen by his side every step of the way. He only hoped that when it was all over, his newest doctor would help him and his little girl face their future, too.
author: Kathleen Korbel
